attributes.action: Make at least one of the proposed new 'green' towns a car free town.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The motor car as we know it today is doomed. It kills people and the planet.
Most forward thinking planners say we must move to car free cities.
I should like to see this country be amongst the first in the world to build such a town.The homes would sell like hot cakes!
